Nerang.ab: gāh ī hāwan bēd vohū uxšiiā manaŋhā xšaϑrā aṣ̌ācā uštā tanūm sē bār guftan ka gāh ī rapihwin bēd imā raōcā̊ barəzištəm barəzimanąm sē bār guftan ka gāh ī uzērin bēd yaɱī spəṇtā ϑβā maińiiū uruuaēsē jasō sē bār guftan harw gāh dārēd sē bār guftan ud ka yašt nōgnāwar ayāb sīh rōzag harw sē gāh ī bāmyazd nēmrōz ud bārag guftan harw ēk sē bār

When it is (When) it is the gāh hāwan, he should recite vohū uxšiiā manaŋhā xšaϑrā aṣ̌ācā uštā tanūm three times. When it is rapihwin, he should recite imā raōcā̊ barəzištəm barəzimanąm three times. When it is gāh uzērin, he should recite yaɱī spəṇtā ϑβā maińiiū uruuaēsē jasō three times.He should recite three times any gāh. When it is the yašt Nōgnāwar or Sīrōzag, he should recite every three gāh, the one of Bāmzayd, the one of noon and the one of aybārag(?) each one three times.
